item.title: How Do Make My Npcs Say how Many Players Are ON
item.dc:creator: @Season-Scape Season-Scape
item.description:
@Season-Scape wrote:

1st one i get this error
NPCHandler.java:566: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable players
location: class NPCHandler
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Pl
ayers online:” + players;

             ^

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
:: Done!
Press any key to continue . . .

2nd one

makes them say Players online: + players lol ty anyways

Read full topic
item.source: How Do Make My Npcs Say how Many Players Are ON

item.title: How Do Make My Npcs Say how Many Players Are ON
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Should be

“Players online:” + players;

maybe

if not try this

“Players online: + players”;

Read full topic
item.source: How Do Make My Npcs Say how Many Players Are ON

item.title: How Do Make My Npcs Say how Many Players Are ON
item.dc:creator: @Season-Scape Season-Scape
item.description:
@Season-Scape wrote:

im wonder how to change for my npc says there is (players) online coudl any1 help this what ive tried

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 170) { if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Players online : +players"; } }

please help

Alex

Read full topic
